author: ogenev
content: If I remember correctly, the recent changes are not implemented for Deneb

author: kolbyml
content:
<@&1331662419659063337> <@&1331662799000043681> <@&1331663186088431788> <@&1331663350937157813> <https://github.com/ethereum/hive/pull/1246> here is a PR and instructions for how to test client interop that the no union changes and pre-capella proofs are working as expected.

<@&1331663350937157813> currently shisui is commented out as I couldn't find a PR with the changes available
